SEARCH
Package com.example.app.controller

Class WorkloadController

java.lang.Object
com.example.app.controller.WorkloadController
@RestController public class WorkloadController extends Object
WorkloadController handles HTTP requests related to the calculation of workload for courses and users. It uses ReviewRepository and ScheduleRepository for retrieving necessary data.

  • Method Details

    • getStudent

      @GetMapping("/workload/byCourseID/{course_id}") public Workload getStudent(@PathVariable("course_id") Long course_id)
      Retrieves the workload of a course based on its ID.
      Parameters:
      course_id - the ID of the course to calculate workload for
      Returns:
      a Workload object containing the average rating, difficulty, and time commitment for the course

    • getAverageWorkload

      @GetMapping("/workload/byUserid/{user_id}") public Workload getAverageWorkload(@PathVariable("user_id") Long student_id)
      Retrieves the average workload of a user based on their user ID.
      Parameters:
      student_id - the ID of the user to calculate workload for
      Returns:
      a Workload object containing the average rating, difficulty, and time commitment for the user

    • getSchedulWorkload

      public Workload getSchedulWorkload(Long user_id)
      Calculates the average workload for a user's schedule.
      Parameters:
      user_id - the user ID for whom to calculate workload
      Returns:
      a Workload object representing the average workload of the user's schedule

    • getCourseWorkload

      public Workload getCourseWorkload(Long course_id)
      Calculates the workload for a given course.
      Parameters:
      course_id - the course ID to calculate workload for
      Returns:
      a Workload object representing the workload of the course
